alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:49PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Claiborne, northwestern Hawkins, Hancock, Grainger, northeastern Union, central Hamblen and southern Lee Counties through 315 PM EST... At 249 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hensley Store to near Tazewell to 6 miles northeast of Maynardville. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Maynardville, Sneedville, Rutledge, Jonesville, New Tazewell, Bean Station, Tazewell, Lone Mountain and Howard Quarter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
